fullText:
Mrs Helen M. Brown
Found dear
Mrs Sleeper at
the Depot - had
fine audience
& good visit.
Mr Sleeper
very feeble - did
not go out -
summaryText: Susan B. Anthony visits Mrs. Sleeper in Mt Morris, NY and has a good visit with her and Mrs. Helen M. Brown. Mr. Sleeper is too feeble to go out.
